short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, hassle-free todo list extension that tracks all todos for a single day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track all your todos for the day. This extension helps avoid todo clutter by clearing all the todos after a day. Better get to completing them!

Here are some basic features: 
- Add and delete todos
- Options to turn on notifications and receive reminders. 
- View stats and have a todo grade
